entry.title: Ukraine Slams Idea of Swapping Land for Peace
entry.content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky dismissed suggestions that his country should cede territory, comparing them to attempts to appease Nazi Germany, as Russia stepped up its attacks in Ukraineâ€™s east.

entry.title: As Russian Forces Retreated, Mock Executions and Beatings Increased
entry.content: Caught out by drone attacks and ambushes, Russian patrols began targeting civilians for interrogation in the weeks following the Ukraine invasion, convinced that citizens were taking photos of their positions or passing other information about their formations to Ukrainian forces.
